localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
ROBINHOOD GIVES ANGERED EMPLOYEES $40 DOORDASH GIFT CARDS TO SATIATE THEIR RAGE *

(Not satire)

$DASH
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

localize.full_text:
ROBINHOOD向愤怒的员工赠送40美元DOORDASH礼品卡，以满足他们的愤怒*。

(不是讽刺)

$DASH

ROBINHOOD向憤怒的員工贈送40美元DOORDASH禮品卡，以滿足他們的憤怒*。

(不是諷刺)

$DASH

previous.excerpt: WishU is a free and intuitive mobile app that simplifies group celebratory video creation for any occasion. Create an event and contribute videos and app stitches it masterfully. It is free!
previous.title: WishU - Create a group celebratory video for someone special

localize.description: WishU是一款免费且直观的移动应用，它简化了任何场合下的集体庆祝视频创作。创建一个事件，并贡献视频和应用程序缝合它巧妙。它是免费的
localize.tagline: 为某个特别的人创建一个集体庆祝视频

localize.description: WishU是一款免費且直觀的移動應用，它簡化了任何場合下的集體慶祝視頻創作。創建一個事件，並貢獻視頻和應用程序縫合它巧妙。它是免費的
localize.tagline: 爲某個特別的人創建一個集體慶祝視頻

next.excerpt: Verso is a universal mobile cashback application available on iOS and android. Verso rewards user's purchases made from the app in BTU cryptocurrency. BTU can be redeemed into any gift card of the user's choice inside the app.
next.title: Verso - Earn free crypto as cashback

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移动返现应用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密货币奖励用户在应用内的购物。BTU可以在应用内兑换成用户选择的任何礼品卡。
localize.tagline: 赚取免费的加密货币作为现金回馈

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移動返現應用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密貨幣獎勵用戶在應用內的購物。BTU可以在應用內兌換成用戶選擇的任何禮品卡。
localize.tagline: 賺取免費的加密貨幣作爲現金回饋
